attributes.action: Help for the decrease on refugees crisis
attributes.background: There are around 126,000 refugees in our country and we have to make as much as possible to help them, because we are all responsible for each other and we should treat and be treat equally. More than 50% of the refugees are under 18 and that means they won't have normal life if we don't help them.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. It is clear you care about the refugee crisis. You could start a petition calling for a specific action from the UK Government to help refugees.
